data.text: Botaeɛ bi a ɛdi mu akanyane mʼakoma
Fa wʼakofena bɔ wo nkyɛn mu, Ao Otumfoɔ;
Fa wo kɛseyɛ mu kɔ wʼanim nkonimdie so
Ma wo bɛmma namnam no nhwere ɔhene atamfoɔ akoma mu;
Ao Onyankopɔn, wʼahennwa no bɛtena hɔ daa daa;
Kurobo, pɛperɛ ne bɛwewonua hwa agye wo batakari mu nyinaa;
Ahemfo mmammaa ka wo mmaa atitire ho;
Ao ɔbabaa tie, dwene ho na yɛ ɔsetie;
Ɔhene babaa a ɔwɔ ne piam no yɛ onimuonyamfoɔ
Ɔhyɛ ntadeɛ a wɔadi mu adwinneɛ na wɔde no kɔma ɔhene;
Wɔde ahosɛpɛ ne anigyeɛ kɔ mu;
Mɛma wɔakae wo wɔ awontoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu;
